info.name: Galactic Diaries API
info.description: Backend API for Galactic Diaries application to manage users, posts, comments, and authentication.

request.description: Fetch all users from database. Admins only.

request.description: Gets a single user by ID.
Create a new user as an admin.
Updates a single user by ID.
Route to upload a user photo
Removes a signle user by ID.

item.name: Posts

request.description:
Finds and returns all posts. Can use four params:
- select: choose the fields to return
- sort: choose the field to sort by
- limit: choose the amount to show
- page: choose which page to start by

response.name: Get all posts with Params
Get all posts

item.description: CRUD functionality for Posts and Comments.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Route which returns the user's information based on their stored token.
Route which clears out cookie by return blank cookie with short expiration.

header.value: token=none; Path=/; Expires=Wed, 14 Oct 2020 03:41:32 GMT; HttpOnly

request.description: Creates a new user and returns a token or cookie.
Route for logging in user using email and password. Returns cookie and token.
Sends email to user. Generates reset token.
Resets passwording using prior reset Password token.
Update name, email, or bio using the logged in user's token.
Update's logged in user's password by sending current password and new password.
Uploads a photo using the logged in user's token.
Removes the logged in user from the database permanently.

item.description: Routers for user authentication including registering, login, reset password, etc.
